page.title: 14MEDIA/INFO SERVICES/ENERGY
page.content:
Haddington is served by the major television and radio networks. The area also has its own newspaper;{"The {East Lothian Courier"}which serves as a local news carrier to the whole of East Lothian, of local events and happenings of the district. The town also has its own{"booster"}television ariel situated to the east of the town.
{INFORMATION SERVICES }Haddington has the{Library}headquarters for East Lothian. It is also served by its own library and{Citizen's Advice Bureau.
{ENERGY}:The usual utilities are available. Gas is the popular choice of fuel in new housing; an increasing number of homes are converting to the use of solar panels.
